mapper.select: select q.question_number, q.user_number, q.teach_user_number, q.problem_number, q.question_title, q.question_content, q.question_answered, q.question_check, q.created_at, q.question_reply, p.problem_title from Question q left outer join Problem p on q.problem_number = p.problem_number order by question_answered asc, created_at desc
